attributes.review: This app is LAME I can’t believe I thought I could vote for the beautiful orange king. I’m pretty sure they gave my number the TELEMARKETERS😡 And when I tried to delete the app some random dude came to my house and kidnapped me! He tried to hypnotize me into giving 5 STARS. So I tricked them into thinking it worked, but when he least expected it I RKO’D HIM! then the body shriveled up in my garage so. ONE STAR!

attributes.title: gen Z 2020
attributes.review:
worst app ever , i think that there shouldn’t be an app for a racist man who doesn’t care about anyone but himself , and i also think we need to get back , for everything , hispanic black white , doesn’t matter we were all
made as humans you know , just bc you say something doesn’t mean it always has to go your way

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see if trump had any redeeming qualities, however, I couldn’t get very far because as soon as the app opened the was a hideous grotesque monster on my screen. It made my dog upset and she was scared to leave her cage for over an hour😭... also is asked for personal information and only gave news that supports trump... sooooo yeah

attributes.title: just no
attributes.review: When opening the app i was greeted with the face of our president. Unfortunately I was very displeased and scared at the harsh reality that this guy is our president. His face reminded me of the doctor who told me my grandma died; distorted. With that being said after downloading this app i have lost a great amount of brain cells. Wouldn’t recommend unless your a idiot who thinks covid-19 is political.

attributes.title: I ALMOST DIED BECAUSE OF THIS APP🤩🤪✨
attributes.review: So I was on the App Store looking at all the apps and I saw this Trump one so I was like bet imma get it🤪so it started to download it and when it was downloading i kept hearing a voice like trump so that was the first red flag🤩Then after it was finished I was so excited to see the app so I opened it and there it was. TRUMP JUST STARING AT ME😳 he put his hand THROUGH THE SCREEN AND STRANGLED ME😟 I ALMOST DIED😔. DONT RECOMMEND THIS APP RATHER PLAY SUBWAY SUFERS😔😔

attributes.title: I hate it
attributes.review:
This app destroyed my phone’s battery, told me that women have no rights and never should, it told me I can’t have freedom of speech, is trying to make people of color feel useless and scared for their life, and many more things.

I also got a really bad spray tan from this app and a Karen attacked me while writing this review. 

I DO NOT recommend getting this app!!

attributes.title: 1 Star
attributes.review: This app took longer to download than to use it and recommend not getting this app because of the waste of time and waste of storage. I also hate the fact that people download this as something inspirational but it’s just an app and there’s no point if this app will get token down so like I said it’s a waste of time.

attributes.title: Just horrible💫✨
attributes.review: It took FOREVER to download. And when I opened it, it kept glitching, lagging, and freezing. And when it did work, an extremely orange cheeto🟠 popped up and scared me🥺 I was expecting to use this app as support for the bEsT pReSiDeNt the U.S. has seen so far, but his picture never appeared🥺😭 there wasn’t much I could do and I’m still very heart broken by that🥺😋

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: When I open the app I saw something terrifying, It scared me to the point I couldn’t even get on my phone for 2 weeks. I also think my rats saw it cuz they haven’t came out over 2 weeks, I believe y’all should shut down the app before anyone goes through what I went through. I’m really disappointed...

attributes.title: waste of my precious time
attributes.review: I HATE THIS APP, it’s worse then what had came to my mind before downloading it. horrible and i mean horrible i tell you 😾 but i’m so very thankful and have so much gratitude for the lovely reviews that helped with many questions i had 😽💋💋💋 anyways, this app deserves to go down in the dump it’s trash, gross, terrible, nasty, musty, dumb, stupid, REALLY REALLY NEEDS TO BE OFF THE APPSTORE NOW‼️‼️sincerely, Karen
